name: The Robot Saves The Day
description:
- What is the message?

Don't put trash on the road

- Why do you come up with this message? 

I come up with this message because Vietnam is getting more dirty nowadays and a lot of trash is piling up everywhere. 

- How will it make an impact?

It will impact people who throw trash on the road because they will learn that its very bad for the environment and the people around them

- What is the game about?

Player control a Robot to picking up trash 

Trash will be automatically spawned every random range seconds until the robot collect all of the trash before the world get too polluted

The robot saves the day

+ Lose condition: The game will end when the amount of trash get to a certain amount -> change to a room which says that the world is too polluted to live.

+ Win condition: When pick up all of the trash done then the game will direct to this article in order to raise people awareness https://saigoneer.com/saigon-environment/19564-vietnam-discards-46-more-trash-last-year-compared-to-2010-report#:~:text=VnExpress%20reports%20that%20the%20amount,44%2C400%20tons%20a%20decade%20ago.
